price: E, se eles te desmentem, Muhammad, com efeito, foram desmentidos outros Mensageiros, antes de ti. E a Allah são retornadas as determinações.
arabic: وَإِن يُكَذِّبُوكَ فَقَدۡ كُذِّبَتۡ رُسُلٞ مِّن قَبۡلِكَۚ وَإِلَى ٱللَّهِ تُرۡجَعُ ٱلۡأُمُورُ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: wa-in yukadhibūka faqad kudhibat rusulun min qablika wa-ilā al-lahi tur'jaʿu al-umūru
